name: LogX Network
description: LogX Network is the ultimate DeFI superapp, offering seamless trading experience of perpetual markets, Leveraged prediction markets, and more. Expanding to millions of users across TON, Solana, Bitcoin, Move & EVM ecosystems LogX Network is powered by Arbitrum, Hyperlane, and AltLayer. LogX Network aggregates liquidity from top CEXs like Binance, Coinbase, and OKX, delivering limitless liquidity to DeFi consumers.
